```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
m <- seq(10,50,5)
PE <- function(m){c(Students = m, prob = 1-prod((365:(365-m+1))/365))}
t(sapply(m,PE))
```
```{r}
m <- 1:60
p <- numeric(60) #initialize a vector of zeros of size 60
for(i in m){
  q = prod((365:(365-i+1))/365)
  p[i] = 1-q}
plot(m,p, col = "skyblue3", pch = 19, ylab = "Probability of one shared birthdays", xlab = "m = number of students")
```
